title: WE WANT BACK WHAT WE PAID FOR!!! [ARCADE PORO ICON] (THE ORIGINAL ONE)
body: I really don't appreciate that Riot decided to remake the icon that we **paid 15 bucks** for. I'm not the only one complaining, check them out by searching "**Arcade Poro Icon**". So yeah, Riot if you see this please at least give us a response and the ability to choose from the two versions.  I know it's your right to change anything whenever you want but please, most of us liked the old one better. Sorry for the harsh title, I can't change it (or don't know how to).

replies.body: As it turns out, this icon is the way the Arcade Poro is supposed to look. The one with the circle was technically a bug, and we've finally gotten around to correcting it with this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OmMFZ1qe,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-18T01:29:37.107+0000)
>
> As it turns out, this icon is the way the Arcade Poro is supposed to look. The one with the circle was technically a bug, and we've finally gotten around to correcting it with this one.

No... The one with the circle was not the original. The original still had a dark background with a rainbow square border... It got changed to the circle after one of the patches. It's had 3 different versions. The bright rainbow one is not the one I bought the bundle for either, so I'm kind of irritated. They did the same thing to the rainbow star icon too :| Stop changing icons people paid for. It's really shitty.

I.....I didn't say the circle was the original one o_O? AFAIK the original was *accidentally* altered to the one with the circle (repeat this was a bug and nobody intentionally changed an icon to spite anyone). Also, wasn't this icon part of the Arcade Mission pass? We weren't paying $15 just for this icon, the icon was merely a bonus to the other content in the pass! As far as I'm being told right now, this is the way the icon was *meant* to look.

As far as I'm being told right now, this is the way the icon was *meant* to look.

You said That the bright rainbow one was the way it was supposed to look. That was not how it was advertised in the bundle, and it's not what people paid for during the event. The image in the opening post is what the icon looked like during the event. After the event, it was changed to be a circle (due to a bug) without any border. Afterwards, it was changed to the bright version we have now. 

A lot of people bought the bundle specifically for that icon, since there was no other way to obtain it. It's fine if the rainbow was the way it was meant to look, but it feels horrible to buy one product to have it switched for another, particularly if you preferred the previous version. This happened with the star icon too.

I don't mean to be mean about it, but it sucks paying for one thing and then getting something else.

https://i.gyazo.com/f134d3ae73aab06f692fc5c12a5209f5.png

This is the one I was talking about, not the circle one. This is not the way it originally looked no, but I'm being told that this is how the icon was *meant* to look. I'm not sure who accidentally changed the icon, but it wasn't intentional. Don't shoot the messenger is all I'm saying here.

TBH, at the end of the day, we on the boards can't actually get our hands dirty and change it to how you'd want it to look regardless. If you're unhappy with the icon accidentally being changed and you're looking for some type of compensation, I'd suggest reaching out to our billing teams in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to voice your concern and see what could be done!

If you're unhappy with the icon accidentally being changed and you're looking for some type of compensation, I'd suggest reaching out to our billing teams in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to voice your concern and see what could be done!

Intent is not to shoot the messenger. If my post comes across that way I apologize. But as a customer, I think it sucks that the product was switched out. I'm not petty enough to file a ticket asking for my 15 dollars back (and I know they wouldn't anyways), but I do think the OP's request that both versions be granted to those who purchased the bundle is more than fair. The icon is already made. All you'd have to do is grant it to those who purchased the bundle. Don't really see why that is an unfair request at all. 

Additionally most people interpreted the "accidental" change as the icon being made to be a circle, which was the second version of the icon. Which means the icon had 2 accidental versions before this third version.

Edit: For reference, this is what the bugged icon looked like 
https://i.imgur.com/TYrD5CB.jpg

Look, this is dumb in my personal opinion. All poros matter. Border, no border, no rainbow, different rainbow. Why be poro-cist?

PS: As Broporo said, this icon was a bonus from a bundle, and was technically free when you bought said bundle*. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
